cn.title: 关于 Bytom2.0 升级处理方案的公告

message.data: 据比原链官方消息，比原链将于区块高度 709,660 时（预计时间2021年8月20日 10：00  UTC+8）进行 Bytom2.0 主网的切换升级。
比特派暂不支持 BTM 2.0 映射，请转移资产到比原官方钱包。为确保用户资产安全，升级期间比特派将暂停 BTM1.0 收发、派银行充提等业务。请您提前做好规划。
感谢您对比特派 Bitpie 的支持。

en.title: Announcement on the BTM Mainnet Upgrade

message.data: According to the official news of Bytom, Bytom will switch and upgrade the Bytom2.0 mainnet at block height 709,660 (estimated at 10:00 UTC+8 on August 20, 2021).

Bitpie does not support BTM 2.0 mapping at the moment, please transfer your assets to the official wallet of Bytom. In order to ensure the safety of user assets, Bitpie will suspend BTM1.0 sending and receiving during the upgrade period.
Thank you for your support to Bitpie.
